document_data.name: Rorgel
document_data.mainbody: '''Rorgel''', nicknamed '''Silent''', was an apprentice of [[Maerjanthra Shalace]] in the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Rorgel almost never spoke, hence his monicker.
document_data.Relationships: In [[Narnra Shalace]]'s recollection, her mother, [[Maerjanthra Shalace]], had five apprentices: [[Goraun]], Rorge, [[Jonczer]], [[Tantheld]], and [[Rivrel]]. She learned that at least one of them believed her mother to be a literal [[dragon]].{{cite book/Elminster's Daughter/MMP|13|1}} She could not confirm that any of them were dead other than Rivrel, knowing only that they disappeared after her mother's death.
